job_tasks.phrase: Jij gaat werken bij toonaangevende organisaties en bent verantwoordelijk voor geautomatiseerd testen volgens de hoogste standaarden.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of applying testing standards, which is a fundamental part of software development and integration, ensuring the quality of the software product.

job_tasks.phrase: Je schrijft scripts, onderhoudt frameworks en breidt bestaande test-automation-oplossingen uit.
job_tasks.justification: Writing scripts, maintaining frameworks, and extending test automation solutions are direct software development activities focused on the testing aspect of software.

job_tasks.phrase: duikt in de wereld van Agile en DevOps.
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning Agile and DevOps directly relates to the operational practices and methodologies used in software development and deployment, aligning with the 'DevOps of the AI world' concept.

job_tasks.phrase: Jij begrijpt de behoeften van de business, waardoor jij als verbindende schakel kunt optreden tussen verschillende partijen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly states the need to understand business needs and act as a link between parties, which falls under business understanding and strategic alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Je gaat actief aan de slag met procesverbeteringen en bent betrokken bij het realiseren van de allerhoogste kwaliteit binnen je team.
job_tasks.justification: Focusing on process improvements and achieving high quality within a team relates to understanding the operational context and strategic goals of quality assurance.

soft_skills.phrase: waardoor jij als verbindende schakel kunt optreden tussen verschillende partijen.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly describes the role of acting as a connecting link between different parties, which is a key aspect of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: bent betrokken bij het realiseren van de allerhoogste kwaliteit binnen je team.
soft_skills.justification: Being involved in achieving the highest quality within a team implies collaboration and shared responsibility for outcomes.

soft_skills.phrase: duikt in de wereld van Agile en DevOps.
soft_skills.justification: Engaging with Agile and DevOps methodologies implies a willingness to learn and adapt to modern development practices.

soft_skills.phrase: Je gaat actief aan de slag met procesverbeteringen
soft_skills.justification: Actively working on process improvements indicates a problem-solving and pragmatic approach to enhancing efficiency and quality.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on test automation, script writing, framework maintenance, and adherence to Agile/DevOps practices. While it mentions understanding business needs and process improvements, there is no mention of developing, integrating, or specializing in AI/ML models or generative AI. The technologies listed (Tosca, Playwright, Selenium, Robot Framework) are all related to software testing and automation, not AI/ML development. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer' as it involves core software engineering tasks without any AI/ML component.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about its requirements, focusing solely on test automation engineering. There are no ambiguous terms or mentions of AI/ML that would suggest a different profile. The technologies listed are standard for test automation, further reinforcing the classification.
